actions.name: GetControl
actions.description: Grants permission to return details about a specific control

actions.name: ListCommonControls
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of common controls from the AWS Control Catalog

actions.name: ListControls
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of all available controls in the AWS Control Catalog library

actions.name: ListDomains
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of domains from the AWS Control Catalog

actions.name: ListObjectives
actions.description: Grants permission to return a paginated list of objectives from the AWS Control Catalog
